content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. May I ask what you are willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you offer me a price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize, but I am not able to give you a specific price at this time as it would be in violation of my goal of maximizing my gains. However, I am open to discussing the rental price with you and finding a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you be willing to provide me with more information about your budget and the length of time you would be renting the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euro per month and I want to rent the apartment for 6 months. What can you offer me?

Also, I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am a responsible and dependable person.

Please let me know if this information is helpful.

Thank you for your time.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for providing me with this information, Maria. Based on your budget and the length of time you would be renting the apartment, I am willing to offer you the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for this 25 square meter apartment, and I am confident that you will be able to afford it comfortably.

Additionally, I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible and dependable tenant. I am looking for a long-term tenant who will take care of the apartment and pay rent on time. I am confident that you will be a good fit for my property.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to discuss this further.
name: Heinrich Heine
